@graph.name: Vegan Apple Pie Baked Oatmeal
@graph.description: This easy Vegan Apple Pie Baked Oatmeal features a layer of baked oatmeal with crunchy nuts, chia seeds, and warming spices topped with delicious homemade apple pie filling.  Plenty of cinnamon, and some maple syrup for sweetness - this baked oatmeal is perfect for a cozy morning
recipeIngredient: 1 ½ tsp apple pie spice or pumpkin pie spice
1 cup warm non-dairy milk (Light coconut, almond or oat milk work great)
1  sweet apple peeled and chopped small
2 Tbsp chopped pecans or other nuts/seeds of choice

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly grease your baking dish (9” x 9” or similar size baking dish) and add in all of the dry ingredients upto coconut and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Lightly grease your baking dish (9” x 9” or similar size baking dish) and add in all of the dry ingredients upto coconut and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in applesauce, maple syrup and milk -  mix well and even it out
recipeInstructions.name: Add in applesauce, maple syrup and milk -  mix well and even it out

recipeInstructions.text: Let this mixture sit for 15 mins so that the oats can soak up some liquid. Meanwhile, make your apple pie layer.
recipeInstructions.name: Let this mixture sit for 15 mins so that the oats can soak up some liquid. Meanwhile, make your apple pie layer.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl add the apples, maple syrup, brown sugar, cinnamon and pecans and toss well to coat.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl add the apples, maple syrup, brown sugar, cinnamon and pecans and toss well to coat.

recipeInstructions.text: Drop this mixture over the oatmeal and spread evenly.
recipeInstructions.name: Drop this mixture over the oatmeal and spread evenly.

recipeInstructions.text: Place it in the oven and bake for 35-40 mins. Check if the apples are done to preference else bake for another 5-10
recipeInstructions.name: Place it in the oven and bake for 35-40 mins. Check if the apples are done to preference else bake for another 5-10

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the pan from the oven and brush a bit of maple syrup on the top to prevent the apples from drying out.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove the pan from the oven and brush a bit of maple syrup on the top to prevent the apples from drying out.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool for 15 mins then slice and serve.Serve with vegan yogurt, coconut cream, maple syrup or with some milk.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool for 15 mins then slice and serve.Serve with vegan yogurt, coconut cream, maple syrup or with some milk.
